content:
PA is wondering why GF#16336 is allocated to us?
That's used all over the place, and its even marked as owned by FM, which I'm sure is also wrong.
http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-languages.html
@Lloyd McKenzie ?
If PA is left with it, I would suggest that we'll go with Grahame's explanation and close it as non-persuasive.
I suspect because your resources have the broadest need for languages and you have the deepest experience with it
@Robert McClure this is your task
